name: producthunt_scrape_reviews
description: Scrape reviews and comments from a Product Hunt product page. Returns user reviews with rating, content, author, date, and upvote count.

steps.code: const reviews = []; const reviewEls = document.querySelectorAll('[class*="comment"], [class*="review"], [data-test="comment"], [class*="Comment"]'); for (let i = 0; i < Math.min(reviewEls.length, 20); i++) { const el = reviewEls[i]; const authorEl = el.querySelector('[class*="user"] a, [class*="author"] a, [data-test="comment-user"]'); const contentEl = el.querySelector('[class*="body"], [class*="content"] p, [class*="text"]'); const dateEl = el.querySelector('time, [class*="date"], [class*="timestamp"]'); const upvotesEl = el.querySelector('[class*="vote"] span, [class*="upvote"] span'); const ratingEl = el.querySelector('[class*="rating"], [class*="stars"]'); const isMaker = !!el.querySelector('[class*="maker"], [class*="badge"]'); if (contentEl && contentEl.textContent.trim().length > 0) { reviews.push({ author: authorEl ? authorEl.textContent.trim() : 'Anonymous', content: contentEl ? contentEl.textContent.trim().substring(0, 500) : '', date: dateEl ? (dateEl.getAttribute('datetime') || dateEl.textContent.trim()) : '', upvotes: upvotesEl ? upvotesEl.textContent.trim() : '', rating: ratingEl ? ratingEl.textContent.trim() : '', is_maker: isMaker }); } } return { scraped_count: reviews.length, reviews: reviews, url: window.location.href }
steps.name: reviews_data
steps.label: Extract reviews
